Summary: Jurgen Klo takes charge at anfield for one last time during his storyed tenure here boys have become Men Dreams have become reality and doubters have become Believers this is a very very special Club. goodbye sadio Jordan and robberto new season new Squad it feels like the end of an era.

Jurgen Klo takes charge at anfield for one last time during his storyed tenure here boys have become Men Dreams have become reality and doubters have become Believers this is a very very special Club I didnt make them believe I reminded them that it helps when you believe dear Jen I guess theres only one thing left to say thank you Youll Never Walk Alone Applause Music
